# release

**Instance Method**

Releases the OSObject instance

## Declaration

```swift
void release() const;
```

## Discussion

Decreases the retain count of the instance by one. If the count is then zero, frees the object.

## Configuring a Boolean Type

- **free**
- **retain**: Retains the OSObject instance
- **OSBooleanPtr**
title: release
